subtitle: An easy, economical dish that is popular with kids.

method.text: Mix together the breadcrumbs, turkey, garlic and seasoning.

Divide the mixture into equal portions (allow 3 per serving). With floured hands shape each portion into a ball, putting a little cheese in the centre of each - make sure the cheese is completely enclosed in the turkey. Roll in the flour.

Heat the oil in a large frying pan and brown the nuggets on all sides. Pour in the tomato juice and stock, add the lemon rind, 1 tablespoon lemon juice and sage. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 30 min or until the nuggets are cooked.

Transfer the nuggets to a serving plate and keep warm. Blend the cornflour with a little cold water and add to the sauce. Bring to the boil, stirring. Season to taste. Pour the sauce over the nuggets.

title: Derby turkey nuggets
